lead_paragraph: Kat Sullivan decided to come forward after a classmate at the elite boarding school in Troy, N.Y., contacted her.

headline.print_headline: 18 Years Later, Ex-Student of Upstate School Accuses a Teacher of Rape
headline.main: Ex-Student of Emma Willard School Says a Teacher Raped Her in 1998

snippet: Kat Sullivan decided to come forward after a classmate at the elite boarding school in Troy, N.Y., contacted her....
abstract: Kat Sullivan, former student at Emma Willard School in Troy, NY, comes forward to report being raped by history teacher at facility in 1998; school has commissioned external investigation of Sullivan’s claims and has appointed task force to study its current policies regarding sexual assault; accused teacher could still be charged given that New York State has no statute of limitations on rape cases.
